name: Steve'sCottonwoodCanyonWeatherReport
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This Flash Briefing provides weather and avalanche conditions for Utah's Cottonwood Canyons. This includes current and forecast weather conditions. During the winter it also includes the Utah Avalanche Center's avalanche report.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
